entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Squamish Airport 02:00 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Temperature: 3.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 3.5°C
Wind: NNW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Rain at times heavy. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: A few showers changing to rain at times heavy late this evening. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 except 70 gusting to 90 near Bowen Island late this evening and overnight. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain at times heavy. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 except 70 gusting to 90 near Bowen Island in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 3.
